name: Discord
description:
Discord was made in under 10 days for the #gbjam. It's a procedurally generated roguelike inspired by games like Nuclear Throne and Mega Sphere. It includes INFINITE levels and plenty of weapons, upgrades, and enemies.

You can vote for the game on gamejolt here:

http://jams.gamejolt.io/gbjam4/games/discord/87026
